content.html: When choosing a job, the salary is important. But not the most important thing. There are other things you should consider: • autonomy • flexibility • can you contribute to open-source? • room for career progression Take them into consideration when negotiating!
content.value:
When choosing a job, the salary is important.

But not the most important thing.

There are other things you should consider:
• autonomy
• flexibility
• can you contribute to open-source?
• room for career progression 

Take them into consideration when negotiating!
